_header: And love thy God over all thing
_description: John Audelay, A song of the Decalogue — five 5-line stanzas (ababc) including ‘Leue ye me’ refrain and burden (cc): ‘A mon yif thou wold sauyd be / Foresake thi syn or hit do the’

BodDou302.First Lines:
& loue þi god ouer al þyngþi neȝbore as
                    þi selfe I say…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…hou þu hast heldyn hou þu hast spendleue ȝe
                    me
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
hic incipiunt decem precepta in modum cantalene (f.
                    27vb)
